Energies and Passions, No New Order of, Implanted in Man After Fall.--We are not to suppose that since the transgression of Adam, God has given to 


                                     -323- 

human beings a new order of energies and passions; for then it would appear that God has interfered to implant in the human race sinful propensities. Christ began His work of conversion as soon as man transgressed, that, through obedience to the law of God and faith in Christ, he might regain the lost image of God.
